CustomField.description: Used as part of the 'Approval Status'-formula field
CustomField.formula:
CASE( Contractor_Language__c ,
"Quebec French", CASE(TEXT(Status__c), "Not Approved", "Non approuvée", "Payment Mailed", "Paiement envoyé", "En traitement"),
"Spanish", CASE(TEXT(Status__c), "Not Approved", "No aprovado", "Payment Mailed", "Pago enviado por correo", "Tratamiento"),
TEXT(Status__c) )
CustomField.label: Status Formula
